Package core

Class DrawingSurface

java.lang.Object
processing.core.PApplet
core.DrawingSurface
All Implemented Interfaces:
processing.core.PConstants
public class DrawingSurface extends processing.core.PApplet
Represents a PApplet that holds all assets for this program.
Author:
Nishil Anand

      public void setPlayerName(String name)
      Sets the player's name. Note that the name can only be set once.
      Parameters:
      name - player name
      Precondition:
      the player's name has not been set yet. If it has already been set, method will return without doing anything.

      Parameters:

    • getI

      public int getI()
      Returns an int to be used for a roomID/gameID. Whenever a new game is created, this value goes up. This makes it so that two games don't have the same roomID.
      Returns:
      an int to be used for a new roomID

    • isLoaded

      public boolean isLoaded()
      Returns if Firebase has been loaded yet. It counts as loaded once a single post from the Database has been loaded in.
      Returns:
      if Firebase has been loaded yet

      Parameters:
